name: Drag and Drop
description:
Remember how you dragged the little man into google maps? Try something like this in the game Drag and Drop!

is a logical 2D puzzle game where you will have to move humans with your mouse! It's sounds easy, but you have to try it!

Features and Benefits: Interesting gameplay, Perfect impact, Nice pixel art graphic, Above 20 different levels, More than 10 interesting game mechanics.
